ygData.subject: RE: dual weild
ygData.msgSnippet: Well you are able to live without putting a asingle point into the skill. It will take forever to get the first few points through actually using it.  I tried
ygData.messageBody:
Well you are able to live without putting a asingle point into the skill.
It will take forever to get the first few points through actually using
it. I tried to do begging from scratch while waiting for the boat. I
think I had to hit that button about 200-300 times before I got the
begging(1) message. What can I say I took the boat a lot in my youth back
in the days when there was only one boat travelling from Butcherblock and
Freeport ^_^.

Treilanin Loreweaver


On Wed, 17 Nov 1999, Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:

> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> like many skills (e.g. warrior's double attack) i thought we had to put 1
> skill point into duel wield to learn the basics. could be wrong though
> hehe.
>
> Shada
